markdown_send_inline: Click here to send the text in markdown format.
html_send_inline: Click here to send the text in html format.
markdown_description: Type any text to send it in markdown format. Usage: type @GroupsGuardRobot in chat and use all of these available inline commands above without the (/) symbol.
html_description: Type any text to send it in html format.
face_description: Type face, it will show you a list of face made with random symbol.
info_description: Type info @username, it will send the user information.
